queries , answers and supporting passage.from sentence: For our dataset , we construct queries , answers and supporting passages from BMJ Case Reports , the largest online repository of such documents .

detailed description.from sentence: A case report is a detailed description of a clinical case that focuses on rare diseases , unusual presentation of common conditions and novel treatment methods .

Learning points section.from sentence: Each report contains a Learning points section , summarizing the key pieces of information from that report .

learning points.from sentence: We use these learning points to create queries by blanking out a medical entity .

contains.from sentence: Our dataset contains around 100,000 queries on 12,000 case reports , has long support passages ( around 1,500 tokens on average ) and includes answers which are single - or multiword medical entities .
